TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DebugEngineCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: ワークフロー式評価コンポーネントによって呼び出されるコールバック メソッドを参照します。

remarks.format:
## 解説
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The default callback is implemented internally in the workflow runtime engine by an object that runs on an independent thread and provides context for workflow expression evaluation.
